message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering the inflation rates.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  Given the inflation, we should settle this quickly.
I understand the need to settle quickly, Bob, but your offer was a bit too far in your favor. I propose a 56/44 split as a compromise.
